MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have identified and begun repairs to a grounded overhead power line however due to the difficulties and complexities of the repairs, we now expect your supply to be restored by midnight. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30pm on Saturday, 26th December 2020
